summary: Email from an FBI agent to colleagues regarding a draft search warrant for the Epstein investigation, requesting review and additions before sending to an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Virgin Islands. It references an upcoming flight and indicates coordination between FBI personnel.

persons.name: AlMliff
persons.context: Sender of the email, appears to be an FBI agent coordinating the draft search warrant and requesting review from colleagues.

events.title: Draft Search Warrant Coordination
events.description: An FBI agent sends a draft search warrant to colleagues for review and additions before submitting it to an AUSA in the Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: A draft search warrant related to the Epstein investigation was being prepared and reviewed by FBI personnel on August 8, 2019.
The search warrant was intended for submission to an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) in the Virgin Islands.
The email indicates active coordination and urgency, with a request to provide information for additions highlighted in the draft.
The sender references an upcoming flight, suggesting travel by FBI personnel as part of the investigation.
